definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cutting, separation—[[גִּוְרָה]] Ez Eze 41:12 + 6 t.; sf. [[גִּזְרָתָם]] La 4:7; —
cutting, i.e. polishing (AV RV or carving, i.e. beauty of from, shape, cf. VB) [[סַפִּיר גִּזְרָתָם]] La 4:7; their polishing, (or beauty of form) was as sapphire.
separation, [[הַגִּזְרָה]] Ez Eze 41:12, Eze 41:13, Eze 41:14, Eze 41:15, Eze 42:1, Eze 42:10, Eze 42:13, separate place AV RV cf. Da; i.e. yard, or space adjoining temple on three sides.
